sentences.cn: “我们不是在主校区。”——“是的，不在。”

sentences.en: a beautiful campus in New England
sentences.cn: 新英格兰的一个美丽校园

sentences.en: From what I hear, half the campus is lusting after her.
sentences.cn: 从我听到的来看，半个学校的人都想和她上床。

sentences.en: I'm going to live off campus if I can find somewhere cheap enough.
sentences.cn: 要是能找到足够便宜的地方，我就不在校园里住了。

sentences.en: It was she who planned out a new campus.
Several hundred students gathered on campus.
sentences.cn: 几百名学生聚集在校园里。

sentences.en: Students at the Belfast campus have access to excellent sports facilities.
sentences.cn: 在贝尔法斯特校园的学生可以使用极好的体育设施.

sentences.en: The campus covers an area of twenty square kilometres.
sentences.cn: 这个校园占地二十平方公里.

sentences.en: The campus goes back to that river.
sentences.cn: 校园向后一直延伸至那条河.

sentences.en: The campus of Harvard University is very beautiful.
sentences.cn: 哈佛大学的校园非常漂亮.

sentences.en: The school occupies split-site accommodation on the main campus.
sentences.cn: 该学院分散在主校区不同地点。

sentences.en: The students flourished flags on the campus.
sentences.cn: 学生们在校园里挥舞旗子.

sentences.en: The university refused to let Dick Gregory speak on campus.
sentences.cn: 这所大学不让迪克·格雷戈里在校园里发表演说。

sentences.en: They lived together in a mixed household on the fringe of a campus.
sentences.cn: 他们一起住在校园边上一处男女合租的房子里。

sentences.en: They spoke of the old days on the campus.
sentences.cn: 他们谈起昔日的校园生活.

sentences.en: Vacant rooms on the campus were being used by holidaying families.
sentences.cn: 校园里的闲置宿舍住着一些度假的家庭。

phrases.tran_cn: 校园活动；校内活动（campus activity的复数形式）

trans.tran_en: the land and buildings of a university or college, including the buildings where students live
